variants.Description in input context: A30P mutation in alpha-synuclein (SNCA) associated with enhanced fibrillization and altered conformation

Material used.Description: Analysis of fibril morphology and fragmentation in A30P mutant vs. wild-type

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutant fibrils showed increased fragmentation compared to wild-type controls

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein fibrils used as positive control

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No fragmentation observed in wild-type controls

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Increased fragmentation observed in A30P mutant
